front.title: A guide to United States personal protective equipment compliance requirements

author.organization: National Institute of Standards and Technology (U.S.)

front.abstract: This Guide addresses compliance requirements for personal protective Equipment (PPE) used in the workplace, except for PPE used in a nuclear or medical setting. Several U.S. federal agencies administer regulations associated with Personal Protective Equipment.

seriesInfo.name: NISTIR; NIST IR; NIST interagency report; NIST internal report
